name: The Last Laugh
description:
In an age where robots become more and more used, humans became less and less valuable. One day, half of the population disappears, the ones who weren't taken called it the "Rapture". The world soon became a desolate and empty place, and the remaining humans drove each other to the brink of extinction through war.

Play as Patrick, a simple desk worker who has no memory of anything, who will team up with a robot named Benny to uncover the dark secrets behind the "Rapture"...
